description:
Horikawa Mitsuru, a high school student, works at Ryokushou with Itsuka. Seeing the two of them chatting happily together by the sink makes Nagomu feel a little jealous.
While Mitsuru works part-time at Rykoushou to help supplement her large family`s finances, she`s also actively making music. And her musical activities kick up some trouble.
Source: Crunchyroll
